articles.content: When you hit your 30s, you should invest in more skincare products. So, invest in an eye cream, niacinamide, vitamin C, and retinoids that are gentle on the skin.

articles.title: Study discovers link between obesity with oral cancer immune escape - ETHealthWorld
articles.description: Obesity is a common comorbidity in cancer patients. Two recent studies found that oral cancer patients who were on statins--medicines that lower cholesterol--showed improved overall and cancer-specific survival. A team from the University of Michigan Rogel Ca…
